ConfirmDelete: Do you really want to delete the node {name}?
Reachable: This node is correctly set up and running
Unreachable: This node is either not set up correctly or currently unavailable
WithPrivateAddress: Gebruik een andere host/poort voor server communicatie
WithPrivateAddressHint: Dit aparte adres wordt gebruikt wanneer het hoofdknooppunt met het nieuwe knooppunt moet praten. Nuttig als bijvoorbeeld de knooppunten in hetzelfde netwerk achter de NAVO zitten.
LocalNodeEdit:
The local node does not have any editable settings

To change the host displayed with servers hosted on this node adjust the panels master url in the panel settings

deploy.Step1:
## Step 1

Install PufferPanel on the new server, [see the docs for details](https://docs.pufferpanel.com/en/latest/installing.html)
deploy.Step2:
## Step 2

Stop the PufferPanel service on the new server if it was started during installation by running `sudo systemctl stop pufferpanel`
deploy.Step3:
## Step 3

Replace the contents of the PufferPanel config file on the new server with the code below

The config file is usually found at `/etc/pufferpanel/config.json`

```
{config}
```
deploy.Step4:
## Step 4

Enable and (re)start the PufferPanel service on the new server by running `sudo systemctl enable --now pufferpanel`
deploy.Step5: ### Your new node is now set up and ready to go

DeploymentInstruction:
Op deze node te deployen, installeer PufferPanel op de nieuwe server en plaats het config bestand in `/etc/pufferpanel`
Herstart PufferPanel op de nieuwe server daarna.
